org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util

Class Bend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util.Bend

  • public class Bend
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that encapsulates the representation of the bend used for a particular PEdgeView.
    Author:
    Mike Smoot (mes5k)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected PEdgeView edgeView
      The PEdgeView this Bend is associated with.
      protected java.util.Vector<PNamedHandle> handleList
      The list of handles added to the edge.

      The list of points associated with the handles.
      protected java.awt.geom.Point2D sourcePoint
      The source point of the PEdgeView.
      protected java.awt.geom.Point2D targetPoint
      The target point of the PEdgeView.
      protected GraphView view
      The GraphView this Bend is associated with.

    • Field Detail

      • handlePointList

        protected java.util.Vector<java.awt.geom.Point2D> handlePointList
        The list of points associated with the handles. If any handles exist, then points must exist. The points are what are actually used to define the curve of the Bend.

      • handleList

        protected java.util.Vector<PNamedHandle> handleList
        The list of handles added to the edge. If the PEdgeView is not selected then the handles aren't displayed and thus this list is of size 0. Actual handles exist in this list only when the PEdgeView is selected.

      • sourcePoint

        protected java.awt.geom.Point2D sourcePoint
        The source point of the PEdgeView. Defines one of the endpoints of the edge.

      • targetPoint

        protected java.awt.geom.Point2D targetPoint
        The target point of the PEdgeView. Defines one of the endpoints of the edge.

      • edgeView

        protected PEdgeView edgeView
        The PEdgeView this Bend is associated with.

      • view

        protected GraphView view
        The GraphView this Bend is associated with.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bend

        public Bend(java.awt.geom.Point2D sourcePoint,
            java.awt.geom.Point2D targetPoint,
            PEdgeView edgeView)
        Creates a generic Bend with no curve or handles.
        Parameters:
        sourcePoint - The Point2D of the source node.
        targetPoint - The Point2D of the target node.
        edgeView - The associated PEdgeView.

      • Bend

        public Bend(java.awt.geom.Point2D sourcePoint,
            java.awt.geom.Point2D targetPoint,
            PEdgeView edgeView,
            java.util.List<java.awt.geom.Point2D> bendPoints)
        Creates a Bend with handles/handlePoints at the points specified.
        Parameters:
        sourcePoint - The Point2D of the source node.
        targetPoint - The Point2D of the target node.
        edgeView - The associated PEdgeView.
        bendPoints - A list of Point2Ds used to define a curve.

    • Method Detail

      • setHandles

        public void setHandles(java.util.List<java.awt.geom.Point2D> bendPoints)
        Given a list of points removes all existing handles/handlePoints and adds new ones for those specified in the List.
        Parameters:
        bendPoints - A list of Point2Ds to create new handles.

      • getHandles

        public java.util.List<java.awt.geom.Point2D> getHandles()
        Returns a (new) List of clones of the Point2Ds that locate the handles.

      • moveHandle

        public void moveHandle(int i,
                       java.awt.geom.Point2D pt)
        Moves the handle specified at the given index to the given point.
        Parameters:
        i - Index of the handle to move.
        pt - Point2D to which to move the specified handle.

      • moveHandle_internal

        public void moveHandle_internal(int i,
                                java.awt.geom.Point2D pt)

      • getSourceHandlePoint

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D getSourceHandlePoint()
        Returns the handle Point2D closest to the source node.

      • getTargetHandlePoint

        public java.awt.geom.Point2D getTargetHandlePoint()
        Returns the handle Point2D closest to the target node.

      • addHandle

        public void addHandle(java.awt.geom.Point2D pt)
        Add a PHandle to the edge at the point specified. Acts as an interface to actuallyAddHandle() which does the actual adding.
        Parameters:
        pt - The point at which to draw the PHandle and to which the PHandle will be attached via the locator.

      • addHandle

        public void addHandle(int insertIndex,
                      java.awt.geom.Point2D pt)
        Add a PHandle to the edge at the point and index specified. Acts as an interface to actuallyAddHandle() which does the actual adding.
        Parameters:
        insertIndex - The index at which to add the PHandle to the list of handles.
        pt - The point at which to draw the PHandle and to which the PHandle will be attached via the locator.

      • createHandle

        protected PNamedHandle createHandle(java.awt.geom.Point2D pt)
        Creates a PHandle based on the input point.

      • removeHandle

        public void removeHandle(java.awt.geom.Point2D pt)
        Removes the PHandle at the specified point.
        Parameters:
        pt - If this point intersects an existing PHandle, then remove that PHandle.

      • removeHandle

        public void removeHandle(edu.umd.cs.piccolox.handles.PHandle h)
        Removes the specified PHandle.
        Parameters:
        h - PHandle to remove.

      • removeHandle

        public void removeHandle(int i)
        Removes the PHandle at the given index.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the PHandle to remove.

      • removeAllHandles

        public void removeAllHandles()
        Removes all handles

      • handleAlreadyExists

        public boolean handleAlreadyExists(java.awt.geom.Point2D pt)
        Checks to see if a PHandle already exists for the given point.
        Parameters:
        pt - If this point intersects a currently existing PHandle, then return true, else return false.

      • drawSelected

        public void drawSelected()
        Draws any handles previously added.
